QuestData.Title: An End to Everything
QuestData.Description: These spirits must have been released when the tombs were opened... $b$bDeath was not final for the Mogu. Instead, death was merely a stop over on the path to a new body. Spiritbinders used a foul magic to transfer spirits from one shell to the next.$b$bYears of being trapped in the tombs has left them confused. They need to be destroyed before their confusion turns to anger or worse, they find a new shell.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you disposed of the spirits yet?
QuestData.RewardText: You have done them a great service, $n.$b$bIt is a cruel fate to be stuck between the living world and the afterlife.
